content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5), and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Copper cable factory
No copper cable factory exists

### Lab
Consists of lab at position unknown

### Chests
Consists of following entities
-  Chest at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5)
-  Chest at position(x=40.5, y=-80.5)
-  Chest at position(x=43.5, y=-81.5)
-  Chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)
-  Chest at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
-  Chest at position(x=0.5, y=2.5)

### Burner Inserter
Consists of following entities
-  Burner inserter at position(x=3.5, y=0.5)
-  Burner inserter at position(x=0.5, y=3.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities
-  Ensure that the entities are close enough to be connected before attempting to connect them.
### Errors when setting research
-  Ensure that the research technology exists and the lab has the required items to start the research.
### Errors when inserting items into lab
-  Ensure that the item to be inserted exists and the lab has enough space to hold the item.
### Errors when using Prototype
-  Ensure that the Prototype attribute exists and is correctly spelled before attempting to use it. 
### Errors when connecting pipes
-  Ensure that the pipe can be connected to the entity before attempting to connect it.
